strategy: Space Marine armies have a Strategy Rating of 5.
Initiative: All formations have an Initiative Rating of 1+.
usage: The following army list allows you to field an army of Dark Angels Space Marines.

formations.name: Assaults
formations.units: One Dark Angels Captain, six Assaults

formations.name: Ravenwing
formations.units: One Black Knights, four Ravenwing Assault Bikes, three Ravenwing Land Speeders

formations.name: Devastators
formations.units: Four Dark Angels Devastators plus transport

formations.name: Deathwing Terminators
extraUnits: Replace up to four Deathwing Terminators with Deathwing Cyclones and/or Deathwing Knights: Free

sections.name: Dark Angels Support Detachments
sections.description: Three Support Detachments may be fielded per Core Detachment

formations.name: Predators
formations.units: Four Predator Annihilators or four Predator Destructors

formations.name: Land Raider Ares
formations.units: Three Land Raider Ares, three Vindicators

formations.name: Deathwing Land Raiders
formations.units: Three Deathwing Land Raiders, three Deathwing Terminators

formations.name: 0-1 Dreadwing Relic
formations.units: Either two Glaives, or four Deimos Predator Executioners and three Deimos Laser Vindicators

sections.name: Ravenwing Aircraft & Dark Angels Swordwing
sections.description: Up to a third of the points available may be spent on these formations. One Swordwing Support formation must be taken

upgrades.title: Dark Angels Upgrades
upgrades.description: Each upgrade may be taken once per detachment

items.name: Attack Bikes
items.description: Replace any number of Assault Bikes with an equal number of Attack Bikes

items.name: Strike Cruiser
items.description: Replace the Hunter Class Destroyer with a Strike Cruiser

items.name: Commander
items.description: Add any one of the following characters to any unit in the formation

items.name: AAA
items.description: Add any one of the following units to the formation

options.description: Add one or two Mortis Dreadnoughts

items.name: Land Raiders
items.description: Add any number of Land Raiders, up to the number required to transport the formation

items.name: Snipers
items.description: Give up to four Scouts Sniper

items.name: Venegance
items.description: Replace four Ravenwing Land Speeder Tornado with four Ravenwing Land Speeder Venegance
